interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray, 4.3 oz. - Hemp Seed Oil, Aloe Vera, Frankincense Helps Stimulate Moisturize & Revitalize Damaged Hair, No Parabens, Color Safe, Lauryl & Laureth Sulfate Free Review Date: 2020/09/10 Store: GIOVANNI Product Description: ['GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray creates gloss that rocks, with a smooth surface that talks. This Mist will seal in any hairstyle, bridging the gap between natural and salon quality. GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care* lines in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.*According to SPINs.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control, Shine', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Frankincense', 'Liquid Volume': '5.6 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 4.75 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '18640', 'UPC': '716237186409', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/GIOR7', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: I have curly, dry, frizzy hair that needs lots of additional conditioning and is NEVER shiny. I'm always looking for products that add moisture, shine, and control to my hair.

I use the GIOVANNI Mousse Air-Turbo Charged Hair Styling Foam and really like it, so I was excited to try another GIOVANNI product. I like spraying this Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine on my dry hair, and it really does add shine. I also love the scent. It smells yummy. I also like to comb it through my hair to put my hair back in a ponytail. It tames the frizz just a bit.

The bottle did come with oil covering the outside, but it's been over 100 degrees here, so it might've just been affected by the heat in travel. It cleaned off fine (and it was inside a ziplock bag). Review Title: Makes my hair shiny Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
24K Gold Under Eye Mask– 20 Pairs- Under Eye Patches with Face Massager Roller, Anti-Aging Hyaluronic Acid Collagen Eye Masks for Dark Circles and Puffiness Dark Under Eyes Treatment FRLEDM {'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 6.8 x 1.1 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '616985543564', 'Manufacturer': 'FRLEDM'} I love using eye masks, so I got this, because there were 20 pairs in the box, which is a really good deal for the price. I also liked the ingredients listed. But after receiving this, I'm a little disappointed, because it says, "Main Ingredients" and it doesn't have a list of all the ingredients anywhere. So, I do wonder what else is in these.

Saying that - these stay on well, didn't bother my skin left my eye area soft. So, yes, a list of ingredients would've been nice, but I like them anyway.

As far as the vibrating facial massager wand - I didn't expect to use it, because I use stone rollers and stones on my face, but I can see this helping with lymphatic and sinus drainage, so I'll keep it on hand for that. It's actually a pretty nifty little gadget that takes a normal sized battery (and comes with it), so I kind of like it. :) Great value for good eye masks. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user has a strong focus on eye care, particularly under-eye treatments, but has also expressed interest in hair care products, specifically those that enhance shine and control frizz.
- **Value Seeker:** Prefers cost-effective products and has demonstrated loyalty to brands that offer desirable benefits and quality, as shown by purchasing items in bulk and trying multiple products from the same brand.
- **Ingredient Consciousness:** Values transparency in ingredient listings and feels more comfortable with products that are free from harmful additives. The user appreciates formulations that prioritize natural ingredients.
- **Sensory Sensitivity:** Prefers products that feel good on the skin or hair, with an emphasis on those that provide moisture, shine, and manageability without irritation.
- **Preference for Tools and Multipurpose Products:** Shows interest in facial tools like massagers and is open to trying products that serve diverse functions, such as combining styling and moisturizing benefits.
- **Trends:** Demonstrates a commitment to quality and effectiveness across skincare and hair care routines, showing satisfaction with products that deliver visible results and enjoyable scents.

Overall, the user displays a comprehensive approach to personal care, balancing interests in both skincare and hair care while maintaining a clear preference for value, quality, and ingredient integrity.
